snippet.title: XON Episode Four - Puzzle Adventure Game for Android and iOS
snippet.description:
Check out the PC version - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147560/Lands_of_XON/

Puzzle adventure game inspired by games like Myst and Riven.
Available for android smartphones and tablets on Google play store, coming soon to iOS.

Stuck? Here's a walkthrough: http://www.imagofx.com/games/xonep4.html
